articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Message to President of Council of State of Cuba
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Message to President of Council of State of Cuba
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba.
					 The message extended warm congratulations and comradely greetings to Raul Castro Ruz and, through him, to all Cuban people on the occasion of the 58th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution.
					
					 We will always extend firm solidarity to the fraternal Cuban people in their just cause to smash the hostile forces' vicious moves against Cuba, firmly defend the gains of the revolution and successfully build socialism, noted the message.
					
					 Expressing the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger on the road of the struggle for independence against imperialism and for the victory of the cause of socialism, it sincerely wished him greater success in his responsible work to lead the party, government and people of Cuba.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Floral Basket to Cuban Embassy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Floral Basket to Cuban Embassy
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent a floral basket to the Cuban embassy here on the occasion of the 58th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution.
					 An official concerned conveyed the floral basket to the Cuban ambassador on Saturday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Cuban Embassy Here
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Cuban Embassy Here
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Institutions of the DPRK sent floral baskets to the Cuban embassy here to celebrate the 58th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution.
					 Floral baskets in the name of the International Affairs Department of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of External Economic Relations and the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries were respectively handed over to the Cuban Ambassador on Saturday.

articles.title: New Year Cards to Kim Jong Un from Foreign State and Party Leaders
articles.content:
New Year Cards to Kim Jong Un from Foreign State and Party Leaders
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, Supreme Leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received New Year cards from state and party leaders and personages of different countries on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 106 (2017).
					 The state leaders include presidents of Russia, China, Laos, Mongolia, Syria, Armenia, Vietnam and South Africa and the prime minister of Bangladesh.
					
					 Among the party leaders are the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, the standing secretary of the Secretariat of the C.C., Communist Party of Vietnam who is member of its Political Bureau, the chairman of A Just Russia, the chairman of the C.C., Communist Party of Czech and Moravia, and the national secretary of the Socialist Workers' Party of the U.S.
					
					 Kim Jong Un also received New Year cards from the director-general of UNESCO, the director general of the World Intellectual Property Organization and the governor of Khabarovsk Territory and the mayor of Khabarovsk City of the Russian Federation.

articles.title: Reception Given for Participants in 4th Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under KPA
articles.content:
Reception Given for Participants in 4th Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under KPA
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the Mokran House on Saturday in honor of the participants in the Fourth Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Attending there were KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and director of the KPA General Political Bureau, Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, and other commanding officers of the KPA.
					
					 Hwang Pyong So in his speech warmly congratulated the officials and fishermen in fisheries under the KPA who overfulfilled this year's goal set out by the Party in the 70-day campaign and the 200-day campaign for history of big fish hauls and thus protected the authority of the Party Central Committee at the cost of their lives and delighted all the service personnel and people.
					
					 He stressed the need for all the officials and fishermen to attain without fail the next year fishing goal set by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and thus display once again the militant spirit of fishermen in the drive for implementing the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Party.
					
					 He called upon all the participants to make big fish hauls in 2017.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Sudan
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Sudan
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Omar Hassan Ahmed Al-Bashir, president of Sudan, on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of its independence.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the mutual interests, Kim in the message wished the president and the government of Sudan bigger success in their work for the peace and security of the country and its independent development.

articles.title: Greetings to Cuban FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Cuban FM
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Saturday sent a message of greeting to his Cuban counterpart Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla on the occasion of the 58th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution.
					 The message expressed belief that the fraternal relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries based on the socialist principle and revolutionary obligation would continue to strengthen, and wished him greater success in his work.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the New Year Juche 106 (2017).
					 The floral basket and letter were handed over to Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Roman O. Jimenez Ortega, military attache of the Cuban embassy who is doyen of the corps, Saturday.

articles.title: Schoolchildren Give New Year's Performance
articles.content:
Schoolchildren Give New Year's Performance
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Schoolchildren gave an art performance "12 Months of the Country of the Sun" at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace on Saturday in celebration of Juche 106 (2017).
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak Yong Sik and other senior officials of the Party, state and army, officials of the Party and armed forces organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials in the army and society who distinguished themselves in the 200-day campaign and persons of merits.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies and military attaches of foreign embassies here and their spouses, the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, overseas compatriots and foreign guests.
					
					 The performance began with song and dance "We Offer New Year's Greetings to Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un". 
					
					 The performers extended New Year's greetings to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They also extended the same greetings to fathers and mothers of the country.
					
					 Put on the stage were serial songs "We Sing Our Eternal Sun", accordion concert "The General and Children", kayagum ensemble "Gate of Happiness with Floral Decorations", etc.
					
					 They highly praised the great leader Generalissimo Kim Il Sung as the eternal sun, who treated the children as the king of the country, spared nothing for them and showed deep loving care for them all his life.
					
					 Some numbers represented the tireless efforts made by Generalissimo Kim Jong Il who restlessly continued inspections of army units on the front to bring happiness and brighter future to the children of the country.
					
					 The performers showed that Kim Jong Un is the benevolent father of the great family of the country as he is taking deep care of all children of the country and bringing endless happiness to them.
					
					 Put on the stage were numbers showing the looks of the schoolchildren enjoying all happiness under the care of the Party and the schoolchildren's resolution of loyalty to become the young revolutionaries and guards shouldering the future of a powerful socialist country.

articles.title: Fireworks Displayed in Sky over Pyongyang on New Year
articles.content:
Fireworks Displayed in Sky over Pyongyang on New Year
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Fireworks were displayed in the sky over Pyongyang on the New Year, Juche 106 (2017).
					 Working people from all walks of life, school youths and children thronged banks of the River Taedong near Kim Il Sung Square, the Tower of the Juche Idea and Mansu Hill to watch fireworks gala.
					
					 At 00:00 sound of the watch-night bell rang and song "Snow Is Falling on New Year's Day" resounded far and wide, along with the start of the fireworks. 
					
					 Myriads of multi-color fireworks turned the nocturnal sky over Pyongyang into a kaleidoscopic world, presenting fantastic scenery and bringing people boundless enthusiasm and ecstatic happiness.

articles.title: Pyongyang Ice Sculpture Festival-2017 Opens
articles.content:
Pyongyang Ice Sculpture Festival-2017 Opens
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- There opened in Kim Il Sung Square on Saturday the Pyongyang Ice Sculpture Festival-2017 in celebration of the New Year.
					 On display in the festival venue are scores of ice sculptures made by the Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport, Ministry of Public Health, General Bureau of Public Service, Mansudae Art Studio, Pyongyang City People's Committee and other units.
					
					 Those ice sculptures depicting Mt. Paektu, leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp, and the Arch of Triumph impressively show the army and people's yearning and reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 There are also sculptures on the theme of the self-development-first spirit and those vividly showing the reality of Juche Korea.
					
					 Officials of ministries and national institutions, working people school youth and children in Pyongyang went round the venue.
					
					 The festival continues.

articles.title: Many Gold Medals Won in 2016
articles.content:
Many Gold Medals Won in 2016
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- In 2016, athletes of the DPRK have won a number of gold medals in various international games.
					 In particular, footballers took the first place in the 2016 FIFA U-17 and U-20 Women's World Cups. World media reported that the DPRK captured two women's world cups in few months and it reached the peak of reserves training in the world.
					
					 The victories in the AFC U-14 Girls' Regional Championship 2016 for East Zone and the 2016 U-19 International Women's Soccer "Spring of Kuban" showed well the development of women's football in the DPRK.
					
					 Weightlifter Rim Jong Sim and gymnast Ri Se Gwang displayed the honor of the country over the world by bagging gold medals at the 31st Olympic Games.
					
					 Meanwhile, many athletes brought home gold in shooting, weightlifting, marathon, figure skating and synchronized swimming events of the world or Asian championships and other international games. And men's and women's handball teams won the first place in the IHF Trophy Tournament East and Southeast Asia.
					
					 Taekwon-Do players also proved successful in the 8th Asian Taekwon-Do Championship, the 12th World Juvenile Taekwon-Do Championships and the 7th World Veteran Taekwon-Do Championships.

articles.title: Signal Sci-tech Achievements Made in 2016
articles.content:
Signal Sci-tech Achievements Made in 2016
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The year 2016 was the year in which the might of Juche-oriented science and technology of the DPRK has been fully demonstrated, proving the validity and vitality of the Workers' Party of Korea's idea of attaching importance to science and talents. 
					 On the New Year's Day, Juche 105 (2016), there took place an inaugural ceremony of the Sci-Tech Complex, a great temple of learning for all the people in the 21st century.
					
					 A number of sc-tech achievements were made through 70-day campaign and 200-day campaign, which were conducive to putting the national economy on a Juche and modern basis and improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 Members of the February 17 Shock Brigade of Scientists and Technicians active in the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex established a process of producing coal combustion additive.
					
					 A nationwide integrated power control system and dispersion power combination system were set up to keep the balance of power production and consumption and make effective use of natural energy-based power.
					
					 The Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex settled sci-tech problems arising in producing pig iron without use of coke.
					
					 The Chollima Steel Complex provided a sci-tech guarantee for remarkably increasing steel production and producing bearing steel and other alloy steel.
					
					 The Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex succeeded in turning out cold-rolled steel, while the Sunchon Chemical Complex built a production process of acrylic paints.
					
					 A great progress has been made in laying a foundation for creating the Juche-oriented chemical industry based on the C1 chemical industry.
					
					 A quantum crypto-communication technology and a new kind of seed-covering material were developed and home production of many IT products was realized in the country.
					
					 Among sci-tech achievements were the establishment of the nationwide forest-fire information service system, development of new ominidirectional fish finder and technology of making fermented vegetable fish feed.
					
					 Meanwhile, exhibitions, presentations and other activities for sci-tech dissemination and exchange took place across the country.

articles.title: DPRK's Best Players, Coaches of 2016 Chosen
articles.content:
DPRK's Best Players, Coaches of 2016 Chosen
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Ten best players and 10 best coaches of 2016 have been chosen in the DPRK. 
					 
					
					Best players
					
					1. Rim Jong Sim, weightlifter of the Kigwancha Sports Team
					
					2. Ri Se Gwang, gymnast of the April 25 Sports Team
					
					3. Kim So Hyang, footballer of the Sobaeksu Sports Team
					
					4. Ri Hyang Sim, footballer of the Amnokgang Sports Team
					
					5. Kim Kuk Hyang, weightlifter of the April 25 Sports Team
					
					6. Choe Hyo Sim, weightlifter of the Kigwancha Sports Team
					
					7. Om Yun Chol, weightlifter of the Amnokgang Sports Team
					
					8. Kim Song I, table-tennis player of the Amnokgang Sports Team
					
					9. Kim Song Guk, shooter of the Amnokgang Defence Sports Team
					
					10.  Pak Myong Won, shooter of the Korean People's Army Defense Sports Team 
						
					
					 Best coaches
					
					1. Kim Chun Hui , weightlifting coach of the Kigwancha Sports Team
					
					2. Sin Myong Su, gymnastic coach of the April 25 Sports Team
					
					3. Hwang Yong Bong, football coach of the Rimyongsu Sports Team
					
					4. Sin Jong Bok, football coach of the Ryomyong Sports Team
					
					5. Kim Myong Ho, weightlifting coach of the April 25 Sports Team
					
					6. Ro Hyon Chol, weightlifting coach of the Amnokgang Sports Team
					
					7. Kim Jin Myong, table-tennis coach of the Amnokgang Sports Team
					
					8. Kim Chol Ho, shooting coach of the Amnokgang Defence Sports Team
					
					9. Ri Sung Il, shooting coach of the KPA Defence Sports Team
					
					10.  Pak Sun Nyo, aerobatic gymnastic coach of the Sports Team of the Ministry of Commerce
						
					
					 Best Taekwon-Do players
					
					1. Ham Su Gyong from the Nampho City Taekwon-Do Team
					
					2. Pak Mi Hyang from the Pyongyang City Taekwon-Do Team
					
					3. Rim Wi Sok from the Taekwon-Do Team of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee
					
					4. Kim Ji Hyang from the Taekwon-Do Team of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee
					
					5. Kim Hyang Sim from the North Phyongan Provincial Taekwon-Do Team
					
					6. Kim Su Ryon from the Taekwon-Do Team of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee
					
					7. Choe Su Ryon from the Taekwon-Do Team of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee
					
					8. Kim Nam Su from the Jagang Provincial Taekwon-Do Team
					
					9. Rim Ju Hyok from the South Phyongan Provincial Taekwon-Do Team
					
					10.  Ri Song Hun from the North Hwanghae Provincial Taekwon-Do Team

articles.title: Preventive Measures Taken against Bird Flu
articles.content:
Preventive Measures Taken against Bird Flu
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Stronger preventive measures have been taken in the DPRK, as regards the spread of bird flu in various countries and regions of the world.
					 Hong Sun Gwang, vice-chairman of the State Sanitary Inspection Board under the Ministry of Public Health, told KCNA:
					
					 Avian flu of H7N9, H5N8 and H5N6 strains is lethal to not only poultry but also humans.
					
					 The medical inspection has been strengthened in border areas and at harbors and airport to check the inroads of bird flu.
					
					 Every hygienic and anti-epidemic centre is keeping a close watch on chicken and duck farms.
					
					 In particular, the minute observation system was set up in and around habitats of seasonal birds like hills and forests, while segregating sufferers from cold to conduct epidemiological investigation into them.
					
					 And it has been encouraged to fully sterilize sewage and excrement from chicken and duck farms.
					
					 Meanwhile, the hygienic information service on bird flu is being given among citizens.

articles.title: Victory Belongs to DPRK: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Victory Belongs to DPRK: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- World media are vying with each other to report respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as saying at the First Conference of Chairpersons of the Primary Committees of the Workers' Party of Korea that it is the clearest proof of the DPRK's victory that the imperialist and reactionary forces have gone desperate in their moves while calling for sanctions on it.
					 ITAR TASS, Kommersant and Nezabisimaya Gazetta of Russia, VOA, China's Global Times and Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings LTD., of Hong Kong, Japan's Kyodo, Nihon Keizai Shimbun and Mainichi Shimbun and other media cited famous quotations of Kim Jong Un, reporting the conference as a breaking news.
					
					 This is an expression of admiration of the international community at the victorious DPRK winning miraculous achievements startling the world people despite the worst sanctions and blockade by the hostile forces, and validity of the cause of building a socialist power.
					
					 The year 2016 alone clearly proved that nothing can check the victorious advance of the DPRK along the only road of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 The U.S. and its vassal forces, seized by anachronistic frenzy for confrontation, have gone desperate in their racket for escalating confrontation with the DPRK in all fields including politics, military, economy, culture and diplomacy this year, too.
					
					 They staged the largest-ever nuclear war exercises from the outset of the year, pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula and the region to the extremes, and resorted to vicious sanctions and smear "human rights" campaign while talking about "system collapse."
					
					 But the hostile forces' racket for stifling the DPRK ended in a fiasco.
					
					 The DPRK started the stand-off with the U.S. this year with the thunderous blow of H-bomb test and bolstered nuclear deterrence in a phased manner beyond imagination, thus foiling the arrogant hostile forces' racket for militarily stifling the DPRK and putting an end to the nuclear era of tyranny.
					
					 In the 70-day and 200-day campaigns the DPRK demonstrated the self-development-first spirit and created the miracle of turning misfortune into favorable conditions in the northern areas hit by flood, thus making the enemy's moves to strangle our economy and put psychological pressure on us go belly-up.
					
					 This year the world heard louder shriek admitting complete failure of the policy toward the DPRK in the Western world including the U.S., a clear proof of the victory won by the DPRK.
					
					 The hostile forces have gone busy, talking about UN "sanctions resolution" and "unilateral sanctions" even at the end of the year but this is little short of admitting that their sanctions farce ran out.
					
					 It is a law governing development of history for independence to stand above oppression and justice to win injustice. 
					
					 Victory will belong to the DPRK in 2017, too, just as was witnessed in 2016.
					
					 No force on earth can check the dynamic advance of the Korean people confident of the greater victory of tomorrow.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Puppet Group's Efforts to Prolong Their Dirty Remaining Days
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Puppet Group's Efforts to Prolong Their Dirty Remaining Days
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Mandarins of the puppet Foreign Ministry and Ministry of Unification of south Korea, delivering "reports on the pending issues" at the diplomatic and unification committees of the "National Assembly," cried out for "sustained efforts for pressurizing the north to dismantle its nukes through the sanctions on it" and "maintaining the posture to counter the deceptive offensive of dialogue". 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary terms their outpourings a foolish action of the fools to prolong their remaining days by sticking to their anachronistic policy of confrontation, together with traitor Park Geun Hye, and a cynical ploy of the traitors to realize their scenario to stifle the compatriots in the north by relying on outside forces.
					
					 The commentary says:
					
					 The quislings remain unchanged in their true colors as they are steeped in inveterate repugnancy toward the compatriots in the north and the ambition to stifle it.
					
					 It is the sinister intention of the puppet group of traitors to prolong their dirty remaining days by sticking to the policy of confrontation while steadily escalating the campaign to stifle the compatriots in the north and currying favor with their master. 
					
					 Driven into a bottomless quagmire owing to the total bankruptcy of domestic and foreign policies, the puppet group are making desperate efforts to find a way out in escalating the confrontation.
					
					 The DPRK advised the puppet regime more than once that it should draw a lesson from the shameful precedent of predecessors who were sternly judged by the people while going reckless in the confrontation with the DPRK in collusion with outside forces. Tragedy is that it is jumping into the abyss of ruin itself, failing to grasp quite clear reason.
					
					 The puppet group's reckless actions will only precipitate their doomsday, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Puppet Group for Seeking Way out in Confrontation and Military Provocation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Puppet Group for Seeking Way out in Confrontation and Military Provocation
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Recently traitor Hwang Kyo An, puppet prime minister of south Korea, inspecting a front-line unit, cried out for "decisively retaliating against any provocation of the north," determined to "put the situation under control on the spot".
					 The puppet military of south Korea also staged combined rehearsals of various arms and services including infantry, engineering, artillery and tank units, underlining the need to "counter possible military provocation" from the north.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a commentary in this regard: 
					
					 This is nothing but a desperate bid to improve the atmosphere getting dismal in the army as the days go by due to the delay in the decision on the hideous scandal by stirring up bad blood towards the fellow countrymen in the north and to do harm to it by force of arms at any cost. This lays bare the true colors of the puppet group as traitors to the nation, hell-bent on the war moves against the north till the last day of the year.
					
					 Not only the puppet conservative group but also the military are staggering, hit hard by the "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal" which shook the south Korean political landscape.
					
					 Through the reckless confrontation moves of the puppet group, all the fellow countrymen keenly realized once again why the inter-Korean ties still remain rock bottom and why the movement for national reunification is facing such rigorous ordeal.
					
					 The saber-rattling staged by the puppet group from the outset of the year to its end clearly proves that they are the worst confrontation maniacs who can never exist even a moment without the military provocations against the north.
					
					 Such reckless muscle flexing is unpardonable.
					
					 The fellow countrymen will surely mete out a stern punishment to those quislings.

articles.title: Minju Joson Condemns S. Korean Warmongers' War Hysteria
articles.content:
Minju Joson Condemns S. Korean Warmongers' War Hysteria
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, south Korean puppet warmongers staged Apache firing drill at a shooting range in Kyonggi Province.
					 Earlier, they conducted a joint drill, crying out for acquiring "maximum capability of combat forces" in contingency, maintaining "maximum capability and combat posture to wipe out the enemy" and talking about "coordinated operations" of infantry, artillery and engineering forces and the like as part of the war rehearsals for invading the north. 
					
					 They also introduced air-to-ground missile Taurus from abroad and deployed them in the puppet air force while talking about "provocation of the north", "severe punishment" and "strike at core facilities in Pyongyang".
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Saturday observes: 
					
					 The military provocations the south Korean puppet forces are escalating against the north till the last day of the year fully lay bare their true colors as heinous confrontation maniacs.
					
					 The war drum beats being made by them are nothing but reckless moves of the warmongers kicking up war hysteria like tiger moths flying into flames.
					
					 The above-said saber-rattling is no more than hysteric fit of dolts as they  have risked their lives, inciting confrontation and war hysteria against the north all the year round.
					
					 However, it is the daydream of the puppet group to seek a way out in the confrontation and drills for invading the north. Their desperate bid only reveals their mean and despicable nature before the world.
					
					 For their reckless muscle flexing the warmongers will meet only a miserable fate of tiger moths bound to perish in the flames.

articles.title: Introduction of "State-Compiled History Textbooks" Rejected in S. Korea
articles.content:
Introduction of "State-Compiled History Textbooks" Rejected in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Opposition parties of south Korea called for repeal of the "state-compiled history textbooks" on Tuesday, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 A spokesman for the Minju Party said at a press conference that the unreasonable attempt of the Park Geun Hye "government" to distort history was already judged along with the "president," adding that it is the only measure to repeal the "state-compiled history textbooks".
					
					 Other opposition parties also said no to the introduction of such history textbooks.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Campaign for Eliminating "Forces Following North" Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Campaign for Eliminating "Forces Following North" Censured
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- An editorial of the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on Dec. 29 censured the authorities' racket for eliminating the "forces following the north".
					 The racket represents the ruling mode of the Park Geun Hye regime and serves as the sharpest sword for eliminating the dissident forces, the editorial noted.
					
					 The Park group put the media under its control and disbanded the Unified Progressive Party through conspiratorial politics and campaign for eliminating the "forces following the north" and sentenced a lawmaker to nine years in prison for the mere reason that he gave a lecture on the situation, it pointed out, adding:
					
					 If such campaign is allowed to persist, such an abnormal situation under which a "presidential candidate" from an opposition party is groundlessly branded as a "spy linked to the north" will repeat itself. 
					
					 It is necessary to condemn the above-said campaign of the authorities and intensify the struggle against it in the new year, too, in order to lead the candlelight action to victory and consolidate the successes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Various Countries
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Meetings for remembering leader Kim Jong Il took place in Cambodia, Bangladesh, Myanmar, Mongolia, Indonesia, Pakistan, Belarus, Germany, France, Spain, the Czech Republic, Serbia, Congo, Algeria, Uganda, Angola and Ecuador between Dec. 5 and 17 on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of his demise.
					 On display at their venues were photos showing the feats of Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the struggle of the Korean army and people. 
					
					 Present at the meetings were personages and popular masses from different walks of life in those countries.
					
					 Among them were the chairman of the External Relations Committee of the People's Party of Cambodia, the general secretary of the C.C., Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the general secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist), the secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, the chairman of the Mongolian Committee for Remembering Comrade Kim Jong Il and the secretary general of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association.
					
					 They said that Kim Jong Il was the great man who performed undying exploits for the happiness of the Korean people and prosperity of the country and the cause of global independence. There are not a few great persons in the world history of politics who made contributions to mankind, but no one could match him, they stressed.
					
					 A message and a letter to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings held in Pakistan and Spain.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed in Russia
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed in Russia
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Russian media gave special write-ups to the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il between Dec. 2 and 20.
					 They carried portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il and his photos and photos showing the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The newspaper Nakhodkinski Rabochi in an article titled "Great nationalist of Korea" said:
					
					 The national self-respect etched in the hearts of the Korean people was implanted by leader Kim Jong Il through his total dedication.
					
					 Holding aloft the banner of Songun to frustrate the moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK, Kim Jong Il bolstered up the military muscle of the country in every way and protected the destiny of the Korean nation.
					
					 He was, indeed, a great nationalist as he made a big contribution to carrying out the cause of national reunification, the greatest desire of the Korean people.
					
					 Newspapers Byvor, Argumenti i Fakti Primoriye and Komsomolskaya Pravda carried articles titled "Kim Jong Il's patriotism," "Comrade Kim Jong Il and Korea today" and "Whole life dedicated to future."
					
					 Article captioned "World reveres Comrade Kim Jong Il as great man" and various other articles were posted on Zebri Deve, online paper of Khabarovsk Territory, and internet news Erofei-Deve. They introduced the philosophy of snow dealing with the noble life of Kim Jong Il who lived with a pure mind all his life. They also introduced what foreign personages said of his noble personality.
					
					 The internet news Gazeta. Ru, internet magazine Lemchich and internet homepage of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, too, in their articles lauded the whole life of the peerlessly great man characterized by his love for the people as he made ceaseless field guidance for the people's happiness day and night.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held Abroad
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Seminars on exploits of leader Kim Jong Il took place in Romania, Finland, Sweden, Germany, Pakistan, Nepal, Malaysia, Indonesia, Uganda, South Africa, Brazil and Peru between Dec. 2 and 16 to commemorate the 5th anniversary of his demise.
					 Speakers at the seminar said that the demise of Kim Jong Il was the great loss to the Korean revolution and to the cause of global independence and that humankind lost the prominent thinker-theoretician and great leader.
					
					 They said he had performed world-startling miracles by leading the army and people of the DPRK with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 They lauded him as the peerlessly brilliant commander of Songun who strengthened the Korean People's Army into an invincible army.
					
					 Noting that he turned the DPRK into a dignified socialist power, they stressed that his Songun feats would remain forever.
					
					 Messages to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at the seminars in Finland and Sweden.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente cubano
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente cubano
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, envio el dia 31 un mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz, Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba.
					En su misiva, el remitente extendio al destinatario y, por su conducto, a todo el pueblo cubano las calidas felicitaciones y el saludo camaraderil en ocasion del 58o aniversario del Triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana.
					
					Afirmo que en el futuro tambien, enviaran la firme solidaridad a la justa causa del hermano pueblo cubano para defender firmemente las conquistas de la revolucion y construir con exito el socialismo frustrando las brutales maniobras anticubanas de las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					Convencido de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran sin cesar las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises en el camino por la victoria de la causa de independencia antiimperialista y la del socialismo, formulo sinceros votos por mayores exitos en las responsabilidades del destinatario al frente del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo del pais caribeno.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia cesto de flores a embajada cubana
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia cesto de flores a embajada cubana
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 58o aniversario del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana, el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio un cesto de flores a la embajada de la Republica de Cuba en Corea.
					Un funcionario coreano lo traslado el dia 31 al embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario cubano.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe tarjetas de felicitacion de jefes de Estado y partido y personalidades de varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe tarjetas de felicitacion de jefes de Estado y partido y personalidades de varios paises
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio las tarjetas de felicitacion que le enviaran los jefes de Estado, los lideres de partidos politicos y las personalidades de diferentes estratos de varios paises con motivo del Ano Nuevo 106 (2017) de la Era Juche. 
					Entre los remitentes figuran el presidente de la Federacion Rusa, el presidente de la Republica Popular China, el presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, el presidente de Mongolia, el presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, el presidente de la Republica de Armenia, el presidente de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, el presidente de la Republica Sudafricana y el primer ministro de la Republica Popular de Bangladesh, el secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Vietnam, el miembro del Buro Politico y secretario permanente del Secretariado del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Vietnam, el presidente del Partido por la Justicia de Rusia, el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cechy-Morava del Checo y el secretario nacional del Partido de Obreros Socialistas de Estados Unidos. 
					
					Tambien, lo hicieron el director general de la Organizacion de las Naciones Unidas para la Educacion, la Ciencia y la Cultura (UNESCO), el director general de la Organizacion Mundial de la Propiedad Intelectual (WIPO en ingles), el gobernador del Territorio Litoral de Jabarovsk de la Federacion Rusa y el alcalde de Jabarovsk.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de agregados militares en Corea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de agregados militares en Corea
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores y carta de felicitacion que con motivo del Ano Nuevo 106 (2017) de la Era Juche, le dedicara el Cuerpo de Agregados Militares en Corea.
					El agregado militar cubano Roman O. Jimenez Ortega, quien encabeza ese grupo, los traslado el dia 31 al general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente sudanes
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente sudanes
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 31 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Sudan, Omar Hassan Ahmed al-Bashir, con motivo del 61o aniversario de la independencia del pais africano.
					Convencido de que seguiran ampliandose y desarrollandose conforme a los intereses mutuos las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises, el remitente deseo mayores exitos en las responsabilidades del dignatario y el gobierno sudanes por la defensa de la paz y seguridad y el desarrollo independiente del pais.

articles.title: Canciller coreano felicita a su homologo cubano
articles.content:
Canciller coreano felicita a su homologo cubano
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El canciller coreano Ri Yong Ho envio el dia 31 un mensaje de felicitacion a su homologo cubano, Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla, con motivo del 58o aniversario del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana.
					En su misiva, el remitente formulo votos por mayores exitos en los trabajos del destinatario expresando la conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran continuamente las fraternales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises, basadas en el principio socialista y la obligacion moral revolucionaria.

articles.title: Seleccionados mejores jugadores y entrenadores de 2016
articles.content:
Seleccionados mejores jugadores y entrenadores de 2016
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Los 10 mejores jugadores e igual numero de entrenadores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para el ano 2016 son los siguientes:
					Jugadores:
						
						1. Rim Jong Sim, pesista del Conjunto Deportivo Kigwancha
						2. Ri Se Gwang, gimnasta con aparatos del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril
						3. Kim So Hyang, futbolista del Conjunto Deportivo Sobaeksu
						4. Ri Hyang Sim, futbolista del Conjunto Deportivo Amnokgang
						5. Kim Kuk Hyang, pesista del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril
						6. Choe Hyo Sim, pesista del Conjunto Deportivo Kigwancha
						7. Om Yun Chol, pesista del Conjunto Deportivo Amnokgang
						8. Kim Song I, tenista de mesa del Conjunto Deportivo Amnokgang
						9. Kim Song Guk, tirador del Conjunto de Deportes Militares Amnokgang
						10. Pak Myong Won, tirador del Conjunto de Deportes Militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea
						
					
					Entrenadores:
						
						1. Kim Chun Hui, entrenadora de levantamiento de pesas del Conjunto Deportivo Kigwancha
						2. Sin Myong Su, entrenador de gimnasia con aparatos del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril
						3. Hwang Yong Bong, entrenador de futbol del Conjunto Deportivo Rimyongsu
						4. Sin Jong Bok, entrenador de futbol del Conjunto Deportivo Ryomyong
						5. Kim Myong Ho, entrenador de levantamiento de pesas del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril
						6. Ro Hyon Chol, entrenador de levantamiento de pesas del Conjunto Deportivo Amnokgang
						7. Kim Jin Myong, entrenador de tenis de mesa del Conjunto Deportivo Amnokgang
						8. Kim Chol Ho, entrenador de tiro del Conjunto de Deportes Militares Amnokgang
						9. Ri Sung Il, entrenador de tiro del Conjunto de Deportes Militares del EPC
						10. Pak Sun Nyo, entrenadora de gimnasia acrobatica del Conjunto Deportivo del Ministerio de Comercio
						
					
					Taekwondocas:
						
						1. Ham Su Gyong del Equipo de Taekwondo de la Ciudad de Nampho
						2. Pak Mi Hyang del Equipo de Taekwondo de la Ciudad de Pyongyang
						3. Rim Wi Sok del Equipo de Taekwondo del Comite de Taekwondo de Corea
						4. Kim Ji Hyang del Equipo de Taekwondo del Comite de Taekwondo de Corea
						5. Kim Hyang Sim del Equipo de Taekwondo de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte
						6. Kim Su Ryon del Equipo de Taekwondo del Comite de Taekwondo de Corea
						7. Choe Su Ryon del Equipo de Taekwondo del Comite de Taekwondo de Corea
						8. Kim Nam Su del Equipo de Taekwondo de la provincia de Jagang
						9. Rim Ju Hyok del Equipo de Taekwondo de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur
						10. Ri Song Hun del Equipo de Taekwondo de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte.

articles.title: Se tiran en Pyongyang las salvas por Ano Nuevo 2017
articles.content:
Se tiran en Pyongyang las salvas por Ano Nuevo 2017
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En ocasion del Ano Nuevo 106 (2017) de la Era Juche, se tiraron las salvas en esta capital.
					La Plaza Kim Il Sung, la colina Mansu y ambos lados del rio Taedong en torno al Monumento a la idea Juche estaban repletos de los trabajadores de distintos estratos y los jovenes y ninos escolares agrupados para contemplar las salvas. 
					
					A la hora cero del 2017, se tiraron las salvas de diferentes colores y formas junto con la campanada de la vispera del Ano Nuevo y la cancion "Caiga la nieve del Ano Nuevo". 
					
					Las salvas hermosas formaron un mundo maravilloso en el cielo nocturno de Pyongyang dando gran alegria a los espectadores.
